players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I think we should focus on gathering information before rushing to any conclusions. Let's pay close attention to voting patterns and statements today."
Diana: "Alice is the mafioso. We need to act quickly to vote her out before she kills again."
Bob: "I think we need more than accusations without evidence. Diana, why are you so sure about Alice?"
Bob: "Diana, your accusation seems rushed without evidence. Why are you so certain about Alice when we have no information yet?"
You: "Alice here. Diana's quick accusation seems like a tactic to divert attention. Bob, I think we should focus on who benefits from Charlie's death instead of baseless claims."
Diana: "Alice is the only confirmed mafioso. Delaying only gives her more time to kill. Bob, if you want evidence, watch her reactions closely and vote accordingly."
